name: Sushi Samurai Chef: Japanese Restaurant Chop
name_original: Sushi Samurai Chef: Japanese Restaurant Chop
description:
Looking for an addictive, challenging game that will help you unwind and provide endless entertainment? You won't want to look any further after you've enjoyed this app!

It's time to get to work! Start slicing and feel the excitement build! The more you slice, the better. Don't let the sushi fall, though, and be careful not to slice any other food in the process. You especially want to avoid the dynamite! Cut 8 with the same cut and you'll get bonus points!

With three different levels and modes, incredible graphics, and fantastic sound effects you won't want to put this game down. You can also choose your background and cutting device colors to personalize the app even more. You can feel the power with this app and will want to keep playing until you've mastered it all–and then you'll want to start all over again!


Features:
* Great for all ages
* Amazing graphics
* Universal app supports iPhone / iPad / iPod Touch
* Addictive Gaming

Download right now!
